casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF John Edwin COOPER. No. D-3037. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 29, 2018.

John Edwin Cooper, of Erie, Pennsylvania, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show *449cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
